# Utility Belt — Developer Toolkit

> A free, open-source collection of developer utility tools. Built as a TypeScript monorepo with React, Vite, and TailwindCSS. All processing happens client-side in the browser — no data is sent to any server.

Source code: https://github.com/chayuto/utility-belt
License: MIT

## Tools

### String Case Converter

Path: /tools/string-case-converter

Convert text between different case formats instantly. Supported conversions:

- UPPERCASE
- lowercase
- Title Case
- Sentence case
- camelCase
- snake_case
- kebab-case

Usage: Enter text in the input field and all conversions are displayed simultaneously. Click the copy button next to any conversion to copy it to the clipboard.

### Ruby to JSON Converter

Path: /tools/ruby-to-json

Convert Ruby hash syntax to valid JSON format with real-time parsing and error feedback. Built on the @utility-belt/ruby-hash-parser package (PEG-based parser).

Features:

- Full Ruby Hash syntax support (versions 1.8 through 3.x)
- Hash rocket (`=>`) and JSON-style (`:`) syntax
- All escape sequences and numeric formats
- Range literals, cyclic references, trailing commas
- Configurable parser presets: Strict JSON, Preserving, JSON5, Lenient, Pedantic
- Customizable options for handling Infinity/NaN, range objects, and cyclic references
- Live validation indicator and detailed parse error display with source context

### Thai Text Modifier

Path: /tools/thai-modifier

Modify Thai text with various transformations. Built on the @my-toolkit/thai-text-modifier package.

Available transformations:

- Remove Tone Marks: Strip Thai tone marks from text
- Remove Vowels: Strip Thai vowels from text
- Thai to Arabic Numerals: Convert Thai numerals (๐-๙) to Arabic numerals (0-9)
- Arabic to Thai Numerals: Convert Arabic numerals (0-9) to Thai numerals (๐-๙)
- Add Thai-English Spaces: Automatically insert spaces between Thai and English text segments

Also displays: Thai character count and whether the input contains Thai characters.

### Thai Text Obfuscator

Path: /tools/thai-obfuscator

Transform Thai text into visually identical but machine-unreadable variants. Built on the @utility-belt/thai-obfuscator package. Useful for anti-scraping and text protection.

Obfuscation strategies:

- Simple Homoglyph: Replace Thai characters with look-alike Latin letters
- Composite Cluster: Handle complex Thai character clusters (consonant + vowel + tone)
- Phonetic Swap: Replace with same-sound Thai consonants (e.g., ส↔ศ↔ษ, ท↔ฑ↔ฒ)
- Zero-Width Injection: Insert invisible characters to break text matching

Presets:

- Safe: Zero-width only — looks 100% identical to original
- Native Thai: Phonetic swap — 100% Thai characters, same pronunciation
- Balanced: Mix of techniques — good protection level
- Maximum: All strategies enabled — maximum protection
- Custom: Choose your own strategies and density

Output options: Copy as plain text, HTML (with aria-label for accessibility), or CSS.

## Packages (npm Libraries)

### @utility-belt/ruby-hash-parser

Industrial-grade TypeScript parser for Ruby Hash `inspect` output. PEG-based with 171 comprehensive tests.

### @utility-belt/thai-obfuscator

Thai text obfuscation library with multiple strategies for anti-scraping and text protection.

### @my-toolkit/thai-text-modifier

Shared library for Thai text manipulation utilities. ESM and CJS exports with TypeScript definitions.

## Tech Stack

- Package Manager: pnpm 10 (workspaces)
- Frontend: Vite + React + TypeScript
- Styling: TailwindCSS v4
- Library Build: tsup (ESM/CJS)
- Parser Generator: Peggy
- Testing: Vitest
- Icons: Lucide React
- Deployment: GitHub Pages
